ecommerceProductData.title: E-Commerce & Product Data
ecommerceProductData.subtitle: Product Data Management & Content: We organize catalogs, improve content, adapt pricing for local markets, and publish to marketplaces, PIM, and ERP systems.

intro.title: From "Invisible" to "Best-Seller" with AI precision
intro.description: Selling online seems simple, but without perfect product content, nothing works. One missing image or number means your listing becomes invisible. We replace the "harsh reality" of manual Excel sheets with AI-driven speed, ensuring your products are visible, compliant, and buyable on every platform.

dataManagement.title: Product Data Management
dataManagement.description: Teams waste weeks filling endless Excel sheets. We automate this. Our AI agents optimize your product data in minutes, not weeks, checking thousands of details to ensure accuracy.

features.1: Automated Content: Data ready in minutes instead of weeks.
features.2: Zero Errors: Elimination of manual entry mistakes.
features.3: 24/7 Updates: Your catalog is always current and active.

compliance.title: Marketplace Compliance
compliance.description: Amazon, OTTO, Kaufland, and other platforms have strict guidelines. A small mistake can lead to rejections or account suspensions. We ensure that every attribute complies with platform requirements, so your listings are never blocked.

features.1: Platform-Specific Formatting: Optimized for Amazon, OTTO, Kaufland and other platforms.
features.2: EUDR Compliance: Automated checks to protect against penalties.
features.3: Instant Rule Adaptation: We update as fast as platforms change their rules.

optimization.title: Listing Optimization
optimization.description: Don't let your items vanish from search results. We optimize titles and descriptions to ensure you hold the "Buy Box"—because losing it means orders collapse overnight.

features.1: Buy Box Protection: Strategies to keep your offer visible.
features.2: SEO/GEO Optimization: Keywords that make products easy to find.
features.3: Visibility Boost: High-quality content that drives sales.

empowerment.title: Client Empowerment
empowerment.description: We solve the skills shortage by training your team. We educate your staff to create and manage their own AI agents, fostering independence and reducing long-term costs.

features.1: AI Training Workshops: Educating your internal teams.
features.2: Custom Agent Setup: Build tools that fit your specific workflow.
features.3: Digital Independence: Reducing reliance on external support.
